name: Analytical laboratory
definition: A laboratory within which ex situ analysis of of environmental samples is performed.

name: Association
definition: A group of persons associated for a common purpose.

name: Center
definition: A place where some function or activity occurs.

name: College
definition: An institution of higher education.

name: Company
definition: An business entity that provides services.

name: Consortium
definition: An association of individuals or organizations for the purpose of engaging in a joint venture.

name: Department
definition: A subdivision or unit within a university, institution, or agency.

name: Division
definition: A section of a large company, agency, or organization.

name: Faith-based organization
definition: An organization whose values are based on faith and/or beliefs, which has a mission based on social values of the particular faith, and which most often draws its activists (leaders, staff, volunteers) from a particular faith group.

name: Foundation
definition: An institution or organization supported by a donation or legacy appropriation.

name: Funding organization
definition: An organization that funds research or creative works.

name: Government agency
definition: A department or other administrative unit of a government.

name: Institute
definition: An organization founded to promote a cause.

name: Laboratory
definition: A room, building, or institution equipped for scientific research, experimentation, or analysis.

name: Library
definition: An institution that holds books and or other forms of stored information for use by the public or other experts.

name: Manufacturer
definition: A person or company that makes a product.

name: Museum
definition: A building or institution dedicated to the acquisition, conservation, study, exhibition, and educational interpretation of objects having scientific, historical, cultural, or artistic value.

name: Nature center
definition: An organization that promotes outdoor exploration, provides nature education, and or fosters appreciation and stewardship of the natural world.

name: Non-profit organization
definition: An organization dedicated to furthering a particular social cause or advocating for a shared point of view. In economic terms, it is an organization that uses its surplus of revenues to further achieve its ultimate objective, rather than distributing its income to the organization's shareholders, leaders, or members. Non-profits are tax exempt or charitable, meaning they do not pay income tax on the money that they receive for their organization. They can operate in religious, scientific, research, or educational settings.

name: Park
definition: An organization that operates federal, state, county, or municipal parks.

name: Program
definition: A set of structured activities.

name: Publisher
definition: An organization that publishes data.

name: Research agency
definition: A department or other administrative unit of a government with the express purpose of conducting research.

name: Research institute
definition: An organization founded to conduct research.

name: Research organization
definition: A group of cooperating researchers.

name: School primary
definition: An educational institution providing primary education.

name: School secondary
definition: An educational institution providing secondary education.

name: Student organization
definition: A group of students who associate for a particular purpose.

name: University
definition: An institution of higher education.

name: Unknown
definition: The organization type is unknown.

name: Vendor
definition: A person or company that sells a product.

name: Youth group
definition: A group of young people that meet and participate in a variety of activities.
